post.body: thanks for the cards it was very nice and encouraging! Thanks Tigger
they have Rockband for the wii if they are interested in that kind of thing, Mario Party is g gooder.
yeah i'll hang in there, i feel not to bad today
sure is
starts 7:30. Be awesome to have u guys there.
I dont know whether 2 feel happy or sad. I want 2 feel happy cuz its Christmas, but feels sad :'( not gonna lie it's hard 2 b pos. right now
Uno day till Christmas!!!! Can i just take a peak at my laptop..... please!!! Hehe the wrapped gift is teasing me!!
Crusing around town looking at lights
Went to the Christmas eve service. It was good, thought id cry but didnt
Went to Toys R Us, EB games, now in Michael's.....uh oh, hmm....good luck getting me out! Lol
There's a smuge mark on my phone.... tried to rub it off but i think i made it worse, heheh
Heading to Lethbridge, will be back for Christmas Eve service.
Oh so tired, i am beat like a steak...... Finished up more cards....think im done.....dont tell me to make anymore.... Untill when i need to
This sucks, i cant find my grandmas check! Rats
Favourite Christmas song came on today, where are u Christmas by faith hill
posted a poem on my blog http://tinyurl.com/5vg38h Christmas in Heaven. feel free to check it out
hurt my lip 2day, was playing a game with kyle & my hand slipped & hit my face, hurt for a few min. it's fine. P!nk song came to mind
Hey, been awhile since i said much. Its been really emotional since Sat. Christmas is gonna be hard to keep joyfull..... Death sucks :'( :'(
Dont drink and drive! Think before u drink or just basically dont drink at all!
Needs and wants to get some sleep but just cant.... Things right now suck....
